@/@TreeToOpenTab/@actions/@toJavaScriptCode1/@actions/@toJavaScriptCode
sname
toTemplate
stype
freemarker
svarScope
Local
stemplateEncoding
UTF-8
soutputEncoding
UTF-8
StemplateCode
#$@text#$@
var xr = Ext.ns('Ext.xworker.remote');
var tab = Ext.getCmp(${data.tabId?if_exists});
xr.openTabItem(${data.widgetNameSpace?if_exists}, 
    ${data.widgetUrl?if_exists}, 
    tab, 
    ${data.params?if_exists});
#$@text#$@
